author: rappoccio
body: This address the issue [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/20346), where the jet key assignment was wrong for PUPPI jets. To make this more robust (and correct for PUPPI), we now compare the keys of the packed candidates, and rekey the AK8 jet accordingly.
title: Fixing key comparison in pat::Jet construction for miniAOD
